website_summaries.verdict: One of the few affordable full-faced mountain biking helmets that doesn't compromise on safety.
pros: 3-in-1 helmet can also be a skateboard helmet or downhill bomber
Included chin guard features a vent to keep the face cool and prevent sunglasses from fogging up in cold weather
Opening has plenty of room for facial gear
17 air vents keep the head cool and moisture-free
cons: Does not provide ample ventilation to prevent sweating in hot temperatures

website_summaries.verdict: Stands out for its versatility as a 3-in-1 helmet.
pros: Removable chin guard and visor make it three helmets in one
Offers versatility so you can switch up styles for activity or weather
cons: Some users note that the pad inserts are too thick and had to replace with thinner inserts

customer_reviews.title: Perfect esk8 helmet
customer_reviews.text: I had to write this review fresh from my first commute with it (on esk8). I've historically never been able to find a helmet that fit and looked right on me. This one fit perfectly (size 59cm), is lightweight, offers plenty of visibility, and looks great (not too bulky, no flashy motocross graphics). The flat black paint is perfect for urban use. Note that the helmet (size L) comes with thick pad inserts. If you're above a 58cm, then replace the pads with the included thinner pad inserts for the best fit. Highly recommended. I would buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Suntoryjim

customer_reviews.title: Better products available
customer_reviews.text: It’s made more for a child who isn’t in need of something truly durable. More for aesthetic and casual riding. My son is 12, fits snug Update. January 23 2020 The visor is incredibly flimsy and broke in two. From falling off the handlebars. My son still uses the helmet. For the price I guess you can’t complain. But wish it would have lasted longer. Update : May 5 with very little use over the the last couple of months, the face mask portion glue has begun Deteriorate leaving the padding falling off of the face mask. This item is not worth the Money
customer_reviews.author: Jose Luis Antonio Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet! Great price! It’s perfectly lightweight and exactly what I needed. I searched through Maddie and even bought one that was too heavy. This did the trick perfect match to my needs.
customer_reviews.author: ThaBlackCobra

customer_reviews.title: Hi performance
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this helmet and it was delivered on the time stated, bought the used like new one and when it came, almost thought they had sent a totally new one instead,and it has good ventilation of what I'm seeing so far ;However I notice that detachable chin protector was not as strongly built, still nevertheless guess it work for my bicycle riding and so on,and yes I'll be testing it through riding soon .
customer_reviews.author: Keyan Dowers

customer_reviews.title: Crashed in, and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this helmet! It saved my life from a bad crash and is still holding up great. It takes apart to convert to a half face helmet but the only bad thing is the visor could be a little more sturdy, because it broke in the crash. On the plus side, you can spray paint the broken side of the visor to make it look cool. 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Hogarth Mann

customer_reviews.title: Gets one size larger (if you're Size M get it Large)
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet, i highly recommend this product, is very light weight , its aerodynamic and looks great , i order the large size and fits perfect on me, i have average head so I'm normally size M
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Glez-Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Cool convenient helmet
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was fast. This helmet is very light contrary to what I originally believed. I love how the chin guard can be removed (the screws are part plastic, so you have to be careful with you screwdriver to avoid scraping the head). Wearing with the chin guard during the summer is treacherous so I recommend wearing that during the winter. One problem i have with this is that without the chinguard its a loose fit and I dont have much padding to make it a better fit.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Cheon

customer_reviews.title: perfect for downhill and stylish for the commute.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of this item since it had not yet been reviewed. You no longer need to feel like the guinea pig. I was hoping for something I could wear on the weedays (without face guard) and still use to play downhill on the weedends (with face gaurd) Ive bought the helmet and am very impressed. Upon taking it out of the package, it felt light weight.The flat black finish is of quality although it can easily be scratched. It comes with two different size pads so that it fits almost anypnes head. If you dont trust my review, read the over 40 reviews left on the .uk amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Cole S.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great helmet for the price.  I highly recommend it for longboarding
customer_reviews.text: I just got this helmet for long boarding. It's light and has great air flow. It offers full face protection for high speed riding. It's also a very stylish helmet. Great versatility (Its a 3 n 1 helmet). Definitely 5 stars in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn C

customer_reviews.title: Size matters
customer_reviews.text: The product description is wrong. My head measures 57.5 cm yet I couldn't fit my head all the way into the helmet with the thinner pads. I ordered a large which claims 58-62 cm size.
customer_reviews.author: MissTasha

customer_reviews.title: helmet is nice
customer_reviews.text: but it broke off the piece in front the first time my nephew fell
customer_reviews.author: Michelle V.

customer_reviews.title: Not for extreme mountain biking
customer_reviews.text: Good upper helmet, the jaw protector is too weak, the inner head liner already coming apart
customer_reviews.author: steph

customer_reviews.title: false advertisement in this product. As you can see ...
customer_reviews.text: false advertisement in this product. As you can see in the picture it shows metal screw holding the part you can part apart. But they're actually made of plastic!
customer_reviews.author: Jeyson Sosa

customer_reviews.title: This is a low quality helmet, not Extreme at all.
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't trust this helmet to protect my head/face if I fell over, let alone trails and jumps. I returned it the same day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but very ill fitting
customer_reviews.text: Looks great but very ill fitting. Was dissapointed that can not use it without it sliding off the back of his head, or choking him at the chin strap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great front Air vent in front of the mouth
customer_reviews.text: Light. Flat black. great front Air vent in front of the mouth..
customer_reviews.author: Jose Carlos

product_meta.title: Ventura Bike-Helmets Ventura Trifecta Extreme
product_meta.description: The Ventura Trifecta Extreme helmet is one of the most adaptable helmets on the market. With a few quick adjustments this helmet goes from a downhill bomber to a mtb/freeride helmet to a freestyle/skateboard helmet. It fits a wide variety of head sizes from 58 to 62 cm and is CPSC approved. It has 17 ventilation holes with a ABS Special Nylon face plate.
feature_bullets: Detachable chin protector and screw-on visor
Three included pad sets will make for an exact fit
Great for a variety of activities
